data.name: PAGUI打鬼
data.detailed_description:
In Taiwan, early 1954, an orphan was taken in by a temple. Upon overhearing of his past, he set out in the darkness of night on a "fantastic journey" to find his relatives. Those at the temple were none the wiser. He grew from hiding from ghosts to fighting ghouls. During his journey, he uncovered a ghost town's past and shocking truths.

Events are based on real people and history. The tale contains the blood, sweat, and tears of this land, along with a worldview in which the ghostly plane can be interacted with.


Immerse yourself in a rich 3D action-adventure game with 3D third-person gameplay. Players will arm themselves as they traverse the thrilling atmosphere of a ghost town.



• Gameplay demonstrating martial arts straight from modern practitioners and masters. State-of-the-art motion capture technology allows players to experience the true power of Taiwanese martial arts.
• Spells are based on Taoist practices, reproduced digitally under the guidance of Taoist priests.
• Solve unique puzzles and beat mini-games that combine elements of Taiwanese culture and religion, such as moon blocks and the Tao's divine bagua.
• Take in a new musical style that merges oriental musical instruments with metal and electronic music. The soundtrack has been professionally produced to induce a movie-like enjoyment.
• The haunted houses and temples within are real. The production team personally scouted these areas and conducted field investigations, experiencing many "spiritual phenomena" along the way.
• Support for multiple languages, including Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Russian, French, German, Spanish and Portuguese.
• Supports Windows
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: "Major update coming July 29, 2022"Ten national languages。PAGUI is based on a true story from Taiwan's history. One day, by chance, an orphan raised at a temple learned of his family background. From then, he decided to set out on a journey to uncover the secrets of his family and identity...
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 遊戲無法開啟請詳見社區中心解決辦法
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 遊戲無法開啟請詳見社區中心解決辦法
